remarks: Exponent subtraction law for complex exponentiation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
cxp0d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
cxpefd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
cxpefd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
cxpaddd.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
cxpsubd $p |- ( ph -> ( A ^c ( B - C ) ) = ( ( A ^c B ) / ( A ^c C ) ) ) $.
